bugreport.Title: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user on USERS menu page
bugreport.Description: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new the user, hence unable to create a new user in the application
bugreport.Steps: <1>Login into the Application</1> <2>Navigate to the Users Menu</2> <3>Filled out all the user information fields</3> <4>Clicked on the ‘Save’ button</4> <5>Seen an error page ORA1090 Exception: Insert values Error</5>
bugreport.Expected_Result: On clicking the SAVE button, you should be prompted to a successful message New User has been created successfully
